lasantha ghathanaye pasubima: # 2009 janawari 8 - rathmalana aththidiya pradeshayedi ghathanayata lakwiya. # 2010 pebarawari 26 - ghathanayata pamini kalliya bhawitha kala bawa sakakerena jangama durakathana anka, nuwaraeliya pradeshaya padinchi pi jesudasan namaththekuge handunum patha yodagena miladi gena thibu bawa pawasamin polis thrastha wimarshana anshaya jesudasan athadanguwata gaththeya. # 2010 pebarawari 26 - edinama kandegedara piyadasa namathi yuda hamuda buddhi ansha samajikayaku da pi jesudasan ha sambandhatha pawathwu bawata sakakaramin polis thrastha wimarshana anshaya wisin athadanguwata ganu laba thibuni. # 2010 marthu - hamuda buddhi ansha samajikayan 17 deneku thrastha wimarshana anshaya magin prashna kirimata lak kaleya.

polisiya gahala thibune mage mahaththayage ayiyata.ra 9.30 ta withara ape gedarata polisiye 20k withara aawa.ee aya gedara janelayak kadala athulata toch gahuwa.passe geta awith mage mahaththayayi loku puthayi koyi kiyala ahuwa.ee aya thuwala wunu mahaththayage malli balanna gihin hitiye.passe polisiya mahaththaya denakal meya aran yanawa kiyala mage pedi putha me aya aran giya.podi putha inne iskole nawaye panthiye.passe pandara 2.30ta withara eya genath damma.dan apita aarakshawa nani api inne bayen.
methanin kala naththe hulankiriya alayi pada gediyi thamayi.

ema raswimata uditha loku bandara, waidya sudarshani pranandupulle, thenuka widanagama, arundika pranandu, shehan semasinha, premalal jayasekara, lohan rathwaththa dilum amunugama, roshan ranasinha, kanaka herath saha shantha bandara yana manthriwaru da sahabhagi wuha.ema pragathi samalochana raswimedi namal rajapaksha manthriwaraya nawaka manthriwarunta upades demin kiya sitiye uthuru pradeshaye janathawage jiwana thaththwaya nanga situwima udesa manthriwarunta laba di thibena wishaya pathayanhi wada katayuthu haki ikmanin aarambha karana lesaya.

ada mama kiyanna yanne wishesha kamakwath bimakwath gana neweyi.ape ratema thiyana wishesha kama upa sanskruthiyak pilibadawa.ee thamayi ape rate uthuru palathe demala janaya athara prasiddha ee ayatama aawenika ahara pilibadawa.kohomath dan pasal niwadu kale kattiya yapane paththe ehema yanna sudanam wela athi.habayi mama methana katha karanna hadanne demala janathawa edineda aharayata ganna ee paththe sama kadayakinma ganna puluwan ahara pilibadawa.ethakota rometa gihilla roman karaya wage innawa wage uthurata gihillath demala wagema inna puluwan weyi.naththan watena amaruwa lesi pahasu na ne.
ithin ganu balanne monawa hari mayamak dala pirimiyawa thamange paththata namma ganna...
ee adras ekata liyumak liyanna kiyala.
mata penawa ammayi thaththayi baya wenawa mawa dakala.
